name: Legend Guardians: Epic Heroes Fighting Action RPG
name_original: Legend Guardians: Epic Heroes Fighting Action RPG
description:
Legend Guardians Premium offer you:
✅Unlock 2 characters: Katerine, Brad.

✅Free 5.000 golds.

Legend Guardians is a combination of RPG games and action games. This game is an offline fighting game which doesn’t need the internet to be experienced.
You can summon heroes from dozens of different heroes. Your heroes will be the guardians. Select your favorite heroes and fight your way with multiple gameplay styles.

Your mission is to rescue the kingdoms are occupied by dark forces. With each battle you need to use the right heroes with your strategy, upgrade your weapons and items, collect awesome skins to become the strongest warriors.

▶ EPIC BATTLES AND UNIQUE RPGS ACTION GAME
Take the role of main hero and hand-pick guardians to create a perfect strategy and be ready for battle. In each battle you need to destroy the monsters based hack and slash gameplay or shoot them like a shooting game. The unique battle system is accessible for any player yet deep enough to satisfy the most hardcore action RPG fans.

▶ HEROES AND GUARDIANS
There are different heroes in game, you will need choice a hero group to fight each battle. You will control your main hero, the other guardians will support you to fight the monsters. Which one will lead your whole team to victory? You decide!

▶ TONS OF ITEMS AND WEAPONS
As other rpg games you need powerful items and weapons to clear the battles, with tons of awesome equipment and powerful weapons will help your heroes become the strongest warriors. Do not forget to upgrade them, they will bring new strength to the heroes.

▶ AMAZING STORY AND RICH CONTENT
The coherent story will instill strong emotion in players with a system of various characters, equipment and monsters, and hundreds of stages to enjoy. The system of quest and challenge breathes fresh airs in each moment of your gaming experience.

▶ RPG OFFLINE GAME! NO INTERNET? NO PROBLEM!
Legend Guardians is an 2D arpg offline game, meaning it can be played anywhere and at any time without an Internet connection.

▶ PVP MODE: FIGHT FOR NO.1
Enjoy a PVP battle with users worldwide! Reveal your unique strategy to the world. Fight each player to reach the highest rank.

▶ FEATURES 
- Unique character system: mighty knight, sword man, sunlight archer, Forest spirits, assassin, shadow witch.
- 100+ items with amazing upgrade system.
- Story mode with 100+ stages with 3 different levels.
- Online game mode with PvP arena, Card strategy mode.
- 30+ unique skill with active skills and passive skills.
- Talent system with skill tree.
- 100+ main quests and daily missions.
- Stunning graphics and amazing sound effects
- Global leaderboard 

Legend Guardians is the best choice in list of action rpgs offline game, be a once-in-a-lifetime experience about a new and unique RPG. Every battle has its own warriors. But not all warriors are legends.
Download Legend Guardians and share your best moment with your friends now!
